note: VERIFIED with thorough cross-checking against literature. (A) Root-of-unity regime: Belletti-Yang (J Topology 2025) correctly cited; admissibility condition j_i < (r-2)/2 with r odd is correct; limit formula matches their Theorem; volume sign variability correctly noted; Costantino (Geom Topol 2007) and BDKY (J Diff Geom 2022) attributions verified. (B) Fixed real q: Taylor-Woodward (Selecta Math 2005/2006) Section 9 confirmed to state results without proof; open conjecture status correctly labeled. This node was substantially improved by addressing all 4 prior challenges.
